description: 2Undr's casual first layer performance Long John features the patented Joey Pouch™ to give the same 2Undr fit and feel while preventing unwanted skin contact. The 4-way stretch Bamboo – Cotton blend makes them lavishly soft and stretchy. Whether you’re on the ice or in the cabin, keep warm and dry with this cozy leisurewear.
name: 2Undr Long John, 30" Inseam - Solid - Mens

specs.value: Tumble dry on the cool to warm fluffing cycle and remove immediately after
Baking your underwear at super high temperatures causes the elastic and fabric to degrade at a much faster rate
Sunlight, as good as it is, is a major contributing factor to colors fading and to the degradation of the elastic and fabric
While these were great on your old tighty-whities, modern materials and fabrics do not need them to maintain that silky smooth feel
Tossing your delicates in with your jeans, towels and other rough fabrics can reduce the lifespan of your underwear. And washing on too harsh of a wash cycle can cause lint pills to develop
